Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 10.2.2

==Policy Statement==

Log administrator actions.

==Policy Purpose==

Log administrator actions to help investigate abuses, mistakes and compromises of administrative accounts.

==Related Guidance==

* [[9d965d93-f39e-42e1-ada0-b4d1a95236be|Monitor the Use of Privileged Accounts]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[659caeca-dba8-42be-9c39-33094ca52447|Use of Privileged Accounts Is Monitored]]
